TextBlock.Text: AZOLLA: Escall, I'm sorry, but I feel my leadership fails to reach the standard of your memory.
AZOLLA: Regardless of what I attempt, I am unable to maintain morale among our small crew, and this depressive miasma seems to be claiming me as well.
AZOLLA: I am trying to utilize the leadership skills you gifted me, but they are proving ineffective. I can only hope I make a breakthrough soon.
AZOLLA: I am clueless as to how to locate an escape that the native people have been unable to find for thousands of years.
AZOLLA: I am clueless as to how to motivate them in the face of such insurmountable odds.
